channel.title: Jagex phone number?
channel.description: Anyone know what the number for jagex is? I had a good account banned and I want to call them and see if my begging will do anything :P

item.title: Jagex phone number?
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:51, topic:88932”][quote author=God of Ikiliki link=topic=130096.msg1290208#msg1290208 date=1178745457]
Nah I don’t work for jagex lol,
Would be funny cause I would hit all pc’s there with my evil stick lol

Ow I can see reports btw
[/quote]

You talk, act, and moderate like an immature 14 year old. No, you didn’t lie about your birthday, and no, your not a play moderator?

Spoilt your fun attention seeker? No one gives a flying fuck about who you are, where you come from and what you do. What people to do care about is when you lie to make yourself look like something your not.

So, congratulations on ruining a perfectly good thread.[/quote]
Chris
I’m not the one who started about ‘my modship on rs’, im not even a mod.
I told them ‘Leave jagex alone lol’ and they call me wannabe mod or pmod or something lol.
Chris, i dont make myself look like something, if i was older and worked for those nubs I wouldnt be here lol.
Lets get the evil stick and hit them anyways?

item.title: Jagex phone number?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Sigh, if you are going out of your way to contact a very busy company just because you, out of millions, are disapointed because you can’t play a game. Well, a piece of advice, playing RuneScape is not life. You may learn a thing or two, but it will not get you anywhere. So, if you are going to continue crying over pixels that you can’t use, I suggest you go shove your head down your toilet and flush it, because you will be better off than you are now.

And, adding to it, we do not want to hear anymore cries about your banned RuneScape accounts, at least, I don’t.

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex phone number?
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

There problem is, they have no customer support at all…i tried complaining to them about it, but they dont really have a way to compliment or complain that i have found, and i would have ranted in the forums but…ding… i got perm mute and ban from forums on my best char, my first char ever…my richest char, had lvl 60 con 2-3 days after it came out…lost it all because they would not read my appeal…

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex phone number?

item.description:
@mprules wrote:

Jagex is a bunch of faggots…They scammed me…! They said they did’nt get my payment when they sent a email to me saying they got the payment…WTF XD NOw there wanting me to pay them back…BULLSHIT. I told them no ive already payed u and i got the email then i told them i would send them a copy of my moms bill.Then hey msged back saying not to msg about the query again.I HATE JAGEX STUPID SCAMMER MOFOES
THEY CAN ALL DROP DEAD

item.title: Jagex phone number?

item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

dangit, i need the number to, the appeal stuff is automated 100% and it rejected me becuase i didnt apologize, i told them the truth, my brother got my pass, he got me in trouble, and appealed one, left me the other, when i tried to apeal they said no sorry you are lying.

item.title: Jagex phone number?
item.dc:creator: @freezepop freezepop5
item.description:
@freezepop wrote:

[quote=“Mopar Helper, post:32, topic:88932”][quote author=freezepop5 link=topic=130096.msg1274728#msg1274728 date=1178476122]
just use appeal a ban and say u are suicidal and runescape is all you have left keeping you going worked for me
[/quote]
Lol, i bet thats been tried loads of times.
you just gotta say something to jagex in which in NO way you are begging, and remember your ‘please’ and ‘thankyou’s’. =]
Just say, i dont have much to do in life except play runescape, then say (whatever you did to get banned) and i am very sorry but my friend hacked me and started bullying me in school and i have no friends, my mom and dad died and im only left with my foster, and i feel like killing my self, please jagex im so sorry, all my friends are on runescape[/quote]

now thats an appeal worth trying lol
jagex pretty much have no choice but to not ban you otherwise its their fault you killed youself lol
if they do decline your appeal write them a letter saying goodbye to them and the world lol

Read full topic
